alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued May 06 at 11:27AM EDT until May 06 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Bay County Beaches. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 10 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Building surf up to 2 ft, the developing seabreeze, and a cluster of strong storms pushing through the north- central Gulf Coast looks to increase the rip current risk this afternoon.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.
